title: Karin Airmail
original_name: かりん airmail 影崎由那短編集
sinopse:
1. Gyakuten Komori! (Reverse Babysitting)
2. Daisuki na Hito wo Sagashiteimasu (Searching For My Beloved)
3. Karin Gaiden: Nishi no Mori no Vampire (The Vampire Of The West Woods)
4. Karin Banga-hen: Maki-chan Koi no Otasuke Angel♡ (Maki-chan, The Helping Angel Of Love)
